phrases: I am glad you are here.
This time, you will not get away.
Why is she here?
It is still light out.
Wait, if she had not been with me, would she have arrived this early?
You never quit, do you?
I am telling you, just give up already!
Sorry, but this is something I cannot give up on.
If you do as I say, I will not hurt you.
I have only one demand.
Return my insignia.
It is very important to me.
If she were just another magic user, I would not back down,
but this one's trouble...
What is with you, Old Man Rom?
Admitting defeat before we even fight?!
Young lady, you are an elf, are not ya?
Not exactly.
I am only a half-elf.
A half-elf?
And with silver hair...
Wait, are you...
It is an accidental resemblance!
Really, it is bothersome to me.
You set me up, did not you?
Huh?
No, I did not do anything...
After you said you would return it to its owner, I thought you were suspicious!
What do you mean?
You two are not working together?
Her nature never changes, no matter how many times I start over in this world.
Hey!
What are you laughing about?!
Come on, is not that enough?
Return her insignia.
And, Sat you, hurry and get out of here.
Try not to let anyone steal it again.
Why are you suddenly being so nice?
I do not understand at all.
I do not understand you, either!
What is up with you?
Puck!
Shield her!
That was a bit closer than I expected.
You saved us!
Nice one, Puck!
Thank goodness it was before five, while you are still on duty.
Thanks!
A spirit...
That is a spirit, yes?
How wonderful.
I have never dissected a spirit's stomach before.
Hey, what do you mean by that?
We can hardly negotiate, if the item's original owner is here.
So I have changed my plans.
I shall slaughter everyone here.
You failed to see your job through to the end.
You talk a good game, but you do terrible work.
You really are just another slum dweller.
You bitch...
Cut the crap!
Do not get your kicks from picking on a little kid!
You guts-loving sadist!
Felt is doing her best to live strong...
Just because your plan was thrown off, you think it is over and flip tables?
Are you a little kid?!
You should value life more!
Do you know how much having your belly cut open hurts?
Well, I do!
What are you talking about?
I am in the process of letting the justice and chivalry I never knew I had
denounce all the world's unfairness!
And what I consider unfair is you, this situation, and...
Stay tuned, folks.
There!
All done buying time...
Get her, Puck!
A brilliant display of awkwardness, which I hope survives through the ages.
I would better live up to your expectations!
We have not introduced ourselves, have we?
My name's Puck.
Remember my name
after you die!
Did they get'er?!
Do not trigger that flag, old man!
One should always be prepared.
Do not underestimate a user of the spiritual arts.
For a girl, you are well accustomed to battle.
My, it is been a while since I was regarded as a simple girl.
Well, from my perspective, all opponents are basically babies.
Still, you are so strong, I almost pity you.
I am deeply touched to be praised by a spirit.
If this turns into a battle of attrition, we should have a chance.
No, fer a spirit, the real battle is how long they can stay corporeal.
That is right, it must be almost five...
Oh, and just when we were having such fun.
What a bore.
That is what sucks about being a ladies' man.
The girls just will not let you sleep.
But you know, staying up late is bad for your skin, so we should wrap this up!
I was not just randomly throwing those around.
Does this mean I have been had?
Goodnight!
My, how lovely...
I thought I was going to die.
But you are a girl, so I do not find that sort of thing very impressive.
Puck, can you keep going?
Sorry, I am really sleepy...
I underestimated her a bit...
My mana's gone, so I have to disappear.
I will take care of things here, so you can rest.
Thank you.
If anything happens to you, I will act according to my contract.
If it comes to it, call me, even if you have to squeeze me out of my odo.
You are going away?
Well, that is very unfortunate.
We cannot keep just sitting around, watchin', Felt.
Yeah, I know.
If we are going to run, we should get moving now.
About before, well...
I guess you kind of saved me.
But just a little.
Also, do not call me a little kid!
I am fifteen, you know!
That cannot be much younger than you!
I will be eighteen this year...
No way!
You are totally a kid!
You need to live a life that shows on your face more!
Here I come!
Ah, but is not it a bit boorish to cut in on a dance?
If you want to dance, I will show you the best dancin' you have ever seen!
Here we go...
Round an' round!
Eh?
What in the
You are so strong, I was able to do this.
Not going to happen!
Old Man Rom!
You bad girl...
You have neither the resolve nor strength to fight.
You should have at least stayed in the corner, making yourself small...
Damn, we are done for...
There is really nothing I can do.
I guess I will have to Return by Death and start over.
No, I do not want to feel that pain again.
I do not want to die...
I guess, as long as I have life,
all I can do is fight with all my might.
Haidara!
Are you okay?
Why did you...
Listen to me, Felt.
I am going to buy us time.
I will give you an opening somehow.
So when I do, run as fast as you can!
What?
You are telling me to tuck my tail between my legs and run?!
Yes...
Stick out your butt, tuck in your tail, and run.
You are fifteen, and I am eighteen.
That means you are probably the youngest one here.
So it is a given we would pick the method most likely to keep you alive.
It is a given!
Give me a break.
A minute ago, you were cowering in fear!
That was then.
This is now.
I am not cowering now, so it is fine.
Take this!
Now!
Go, Felt!
You think I will let her go?
Whoa, I am awesome!
But that hurt the tips of my toes more than I expected.
You let one get away...
For once, I did feel a tiny bit annoyed.
Do not forget about me.
I have grown quite tired of that game by now.
Do you think you can still keep me amused?
If you have got some hidden true power,
now would be a good time to use it.
I do have a trump card.
But if I use it, I will be the only one left standing.
No exploding yourself, please...
Do not do anything hasty, okay?
I will not use it.
Not when you are still here,
doing your best.
Just now, I did not see anything...
Huh?
None of that whole conversation ever happened!
I finally remembered why I am here, to begin with.
I will kill you, you shitbag!
I will not let you play your trump card!
I will blow you away and get
a happy ending!
It looks like you have a bit too much energy.
You black widow!
Well, there is no doubt you will be the first caught in my web.
Nice cover!
Ouch, damn it!
How do you like this?!
I caught you.
That is enough.
It looks like that was a close call,
but I am glad I made it in time.
Now...
You are...
Shall we put an end to this?
Someone!
Anyone!
Is anyone here?!
Damn it!
Please...
Please, someone...
Someone help!
Very well.
I will help.
Reinhard?
That is right, Subaru.
We meet again.
Sorry I am late.
Black hair, black clothes,
and a blade unique to the northern provinces.
There is no mistaking those characteristics.
You are the Bowel Hunter.
What kind of evil nickname is that?
It was derived from her unique killing style.
Her name is known, even in the capital, as that of a dangerous individual.
Reinhard...
Yes, a knight among knights,
born to a line of master swordsmen, correct?
How remarkable, having all my opponents be so much fun.
There are many things I would like to ask you.
I strongly suggest you surrender.
You expect a starving predator to resist such choice, juicy prey?
Subaru, stand back a bit.
If you could stand next to her, I would appreciate it.
You got it.
That woman is like a monster, so do not lower your guard...
As luck would have it,
hunting monsters happens to be my specialty.
Old Man Rom is still alive?
He is not out of the woods yet.
I have to heal him now.
You really want to?
He is part of the gang that stole your insignia.
That is why.
I need him to recover, so he will repay the favor by giving me information.
He would not lie to the one who saved his life.
This is as much for my own sake.
I would rather not use violence on a woman.
Just as the rumors say...
No,
you are even better.
I am not sure I will meet your expectations.
Are not you going to use that sword at your hip?
I would love to experience its legendary sharpness.
This sword can only be drawn when needed.
The fact that it has not left its sheath
means this is not one of those times.
I do believe I have been underestimated.
Well, it is an upsetting judgment for me, as well.
Therefore,
I shall take you on with this instead.
Do you object?
No, it is wonderful.
Wonderful!
Do entertain me, please.
If you have lost your weapon, I strongly suggest you surrender.
She is got a second one, Reinhard!
I am impressed you knew.
Well, I have personally experienced it...
But I do not have merely two fangs.
Would you mind if we start again?
If I divest you of all your weapons, will you be satisfied?
If I lose my fangs, I will use my claws.
If I lose my claws, I will use my bones.
And if I lose my bones, I will use my life.
That is how a Bowel Hunter fights.
Surely Reinhard will not fail to land the decisive blow, will he?
Because I am using my spiritual arts, he cannot fight at full strength.
What do those have to do with each other?
If Reinhard were truly intent on fighting,
all the mana in the atmosphere would turn away from me.
I am almost done healing him.
When I give the signal, let him know.
Now he is all right.
Go ahead.
Reinhard!
I do not really get it, but do your thing!
What will you show me?
The swordplay of the Astrea family.
The Bowel Hunter, Elsa Granhiert.
Reinhard van Astrea, of the line of master swordsmen.
Whoa, whoa, whoa!
Hunting monsters is your specialty, my ass!
You are a monster yourself!
Even I am a bit hurt by a comment like that, Subaru.
I am sorry I asked too much of you.
Rest well now.
There is not a shadow left, let alone a body...
This is all that is left after just a sword swing?
It is over now?
Yeah, somehow or other.
Literally.
Why are you staring at me?
That is quite rude.
It is just, you still have your arms and legs, even your head...
Of course I do.
Do not say such scary things.
Yeah, you are right.
It is obvious, huh?
I still have my arms, too.
And there is no knife in my back or gaping hole in my gut.
You talk as if you have experienced those things before.
There was a time when I did.
Oh, yeah, Reinhard...
I have not thanked you yet.
You saved my ass!
Back in the alley, too.
I guess you heard my heart's cries for help, friend!
If I did do that, I would certainly be proud...
Friend.
She was desperately running around the streets,
and she asked for my help.
That is...
Now, hang on...
If she had not brought Reinhard, we would have been destroyed.
Just take a look at this face, and spare me the ice-statue punishment, okay?
I would not do anything so violent!
And what does your face have to do with
Subaru!
She will go for the gut!
He got in my way again.
That is enough, Elsa!
Soon enough, I will disembowel everyone here.
Till then, take good care of your bowels.
Are you all right?
Whether I am all right does not matter!
More importantly,
are you all right?
That was far too reckless!
Ow...
Oh, it was no problem.
I sure took the long road, but I finally reached this point.
My name is Natsuki Subaru!
And I just saved your life from a heinous villain!
Are we OK on that?
OK?
It means
Are we clear on that?
So...
OK?
O-OK...
I, your rescuer, saved your life.
And you are the heroine I saved!
So would not that mean you should repay me in kind?
Would not it?
All right, I get it.
Only if it is within my power, of course.
In that case, I have only one request!
Yes, my request is...
Tell me your name.
Emilia.
Huh?
My name is Emilia.
Just Emilia.
Thank you, Subaru.
For saving me.
All those times I got hurt, all the crying I did,
all the pain I felt, all the fighting I did with my life at stake...
And my reward was her name and a single smile.
Jeez...
Talk about unequal compensation.
Anyway, Subaru, I am impressed that you are unhurt.
That thing protected me just in time.
If not for that, I would be in two pieces right now.
True, if not for this...
Eh?
Uh-oh.
I should have seen this coming.
Subaru?
Subaru!
Man...
She is so cute when she is panicking...
A parallel world fantasy...
There.
His treatment is complete.
He should be over the hump now.
By the way, Lady Emilia, what is your relation to Subaru?
A passing acquaintance?
I do not recall ever meeting him before.
I thought our meeting, earlier today, was the first.
But he was looking for you.
He said he had something to give you.
That is why it is so strange...
What shall we do with him?
I would be glad to take him home as a guest.
No, I will take him home with me.
That way, I can learn what is really going on.
But more importantly, what will become of that girl and the old man?
Officially, I cannot overlook what they have done.
But...
Unfortunately, I am off duty today.
You are a bad knight.
Is this old man your family?
Something like that.
Old Man Rom is the only one I have...
I guess he is like my grandpa.
I see.
I only have one family member, too.
But he is always asleep at the most important moments.
When he is awake, I would never say that aloud.
I thought you would be a lot harsher to me.
I am sorry.
You saved my life, and I cannot let a debt go unpaid.
I will return what I stole.
If it is important, keep it hidden, so no one can steal it again!
It feels funny, having you give me that warning.
Reinhard?
You are hurting me!
Let go!
How can this be?
What is your name?
Huh?
It is Felt...
And your family name?
How old are you?
I do not have anything fancy like a family name!
I am... about fifteen, I think.
I do not know my birthday.
Look, just let me go!
Lady Emilia, I am afraid I cannot keep my promise to you.
I shall be taking this girl with me.
May I ask why?
If it is for stealing my insignia...
That is, indeed, no small crime.
But compared to the gravity of overlooking the crime unfolding before me, it is trivial.
I need you to come with me.
I am sorry, but I cannot allow you to refuse.
Get over yourself!
Just because you saved me
That was not very courtly, either.
I was careful not to use too much.
Lady Emilia, I will be calling upon you soon, most likely.
I hope you understand.
Please take good care of Subaru.
Today may be the last chance we have to gaze calmly at the moon.
Starting Life from Zero in Another World
